channel.title: CVE Feed for QuadLayers -- Perfect Brands for WooCommerce (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-23981|2024-09-16T20:37:39.792Z -- quadlayers -- perfect%20brands%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: The vulnerability allows Subscriber+ level users to create brands in WordPress Perfect Brands for WooCommerce plugin (versions <= 2.0.4).
